sentences.en: A compressed horizontal scale commonly is helpful in seeing stratigraphic changes.
sentences.cn: 缩小水平比例尺一般有助于观察地层变化.

sentences.en: Also notice the unfortunate use of horizontal scrollbars in all list fields.
sentences.cn: 不过,注意所有的列表域遗憾地使用了水平滚动条.

sentences.en: Do not raise your left arm above the horizontal.
sentences.cn: 左臂不要举过水平高度。

sentences.en: He shifted his position from the horizontal.
sentences.cn: 他从水平姿势变换成其他姿势。

sentences.en: Horizontal resistance, being variable in the wild state, can be domesticated.
sentences.cn: 水平抗性在野生状态下是可变的, 它可以驯化.

sentences.en: In 2 D visualization and drawing applications, vertical and horizontal scrolling are common.
sentences.cn: 在二维的可视化及绘图应用中, 垂直和水平滚动非常普遍.

sentences.en: Stand the table on its legs, so that the top is horizontal.
sentences.cn: 把这桌子立起来, 使桌面成水平状.

sentences.en: Swing the club back until it is horizontal.
sentences.cn: 将球杆向后挥至水平位置。

sentences.en: The apparatus thus described, however, records only the horizontal component of the wave movement.
sentences.cn: 然而, 仪器的如此描画只记录下波的运动的水平组成部分, 但是事实上波的运动要复杂得多(指不易解释).

sentences.en: The board consists of vertical and horizontal lines.
sentences.cn: 牌子是由纵向和横向的线条构成的。

sentences.en: The brown vinyl covering all the horizontal surfaces is coming unstuck in several places.
sentences.cn: 水平面上覆盖的棕色塑料布有几处地方松脱。

sentences.en: The character " 王 " is composed of one vertical and three horizontal strokes.
sentences.cn: “王 ” 字的写法是三横一竖.

sentences.en: The frames are secured by horizontal rails to the back wall.
sentences.cn: 框架用横杆牢牢固定在后墙上。

sentences.en: The lake has a horizontal surface.
The plumbline is always perpendicular to the horizontal plane.
sentences.cn: 铅垂线总是垂直于水平面的.

words.tran_cn: [天] 地平线；视野；眼界；范围

phrases.tran_cn: n. 水平分量，水平分力；水平部分
水平面；地平；（潜水艇）水平舵
水平位置；[化]横焊位置；[医]平仰卧位
水平截面；水平切面；水平断面；水平剖面

trans.tran_cn: 水平的，卧式的，地平线的，[植]（枝条）平层的，同一行业的，同阶层的
水平线，水平面，水平位置，水平的物体
